Activity: Start the day with some upbeat music and a quick check of my personal social media to get energized. Then, log into the company system and review emails.
Read through the goal plan for the week and mentally prepare to tackle it with my usual enthusiasm.

Schedule a quick chat with @comp-1 (Compliance Officer) to get a refresher on the latest KYC/AML regulations specifically relevant to UHNWIs. Need to make sure I'm crystal clear on all the requirements before diving into the onboarding process.
Email @comp-1 to set up the meeting about KYC/AML regulations. @PEOPLE = [comp-1], Topic = KYC/AML regulations update for UHNWI onboarding.

Start outlining the existing preliminary client onboarding process. Highlight areas that need refining, keeping in mind the unique characteristics of UHNWIs (e.g., complex investment structures, international holdings).
Research best practices for KYC/AML compliance in the UHNWI space. Look for examples of how other firms handle this.
Lunch time! Grab lunch with @mkt-1 (Marketing & Communications Specialist). Chat about our weekend and any fun events coming up. It's good to get away from the desk and recharge.
Continue refining the onboarding process document, integrating the KYC/AML research and best practices.
Take a break! Browse some online fashion stores for new inspiration.

Back to work. Review the refined onboarding process with a fresh perspective, making sure it's clear, concise, and client-friendly. Consider the client experience. How can we make this less tedious for the UHNWIs? Perhaps a white-glove concierge service?
Wrap up the day by summarizing the progress on the onboarding process refinement. Make notes of any outstanding questions or areas that need further attention tomorrow.
